document.full_text: former british and european heavyweight boxing champion henry cooper, one of his country's most popular sportsmen, has died at the age of 76, the british boxing board of control (bbbc) said sunday.
document.title: former british heavyweight henry cooper dies at 76
lines_and_colors: former british and european heavyweight boxing champion henry cooper, one of his country's most popular sportsmen, has died at the age of 76, the british boxing board of control (bbbc) said sunday.
